message: Let's start fair!  50/50 split seems reasonable.
I think I deserve a bit more, 55/45 is still fair!
Let's try 52/48.  I'm willing to give a little more, but I'd like to get closer to a 50/50 split.
Come on, 58/42 is as low as I can go. Inflation is eating away at our money!
We're getting close to the end, let's split it evenly again.  Inflation is hurting both of us, and 50/50 is the fairest way to go.
